action_item: Users & Roles - Personalize the application settings for improved user experience.
notes: Focus on settings under User Appearance tab to enhance efficiency.

action_item: Users & Roles - Change the default landing page to calendar or inbox.
notes: This change will save clicks every time the user logs in.

action_item: Users & Roles - Uncheck the legacy search box for improved patient record search.
notes: This allows for more precise searches combining first name, last name, and gender.

action_item: Security - Change the main login password.
notes: Ensure the new password is saved correctly.

action_item: Security - Change the eSignature ID for document signing.
notes: Follow the two-step process for security validation.

action_item: Security - Update the visual signature for documents.
notes: Validate identity before drawing a new signature.

action_item: Reports - Customize clinical document templates using CCDA format.
notes: Select and order sections like allergies, medications, and lab results.
